description: Carry your Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 in style with this unique designer series leather case from Ionic. This case has a black leather exterior with a matching black soft micro fiber padding in the interior. The leather case provides complete protection for your Galaxy Tab 2 reading device. The case has flexible straps on top corners to secure Galaxy Tab 2 device in the case. The uniquely designed skeleton allows the transforming of the leather case into Note Tabletle stand for convenient reading.
title: Ionic Stand Leather Case For Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 (Black)
